dialog.title: What language do you want to use?

notes.1: This notification will not showing after selection.
notes.2: You can change this selection on the Settings page.

user-agent.label: Custom User Agent
user-agent.note: Only is applied if you don't have Fortnite installed.

claiming-rewards.label: Custom delay for claiming rewards
claiming-rewards.note: Value in seconds between {{min}} and {{max}}. Default is: {{default}}.

mission-interval.label: Custom interval time for checking current mission
mission-interval.note1: Means every {{value}} second/s is checking if you are on a mission. This is used with automation feature.
mission-interval.note2: Value in seconds between {{min}} and {{max}}. Default is: {{default}}.

custom-menu.title: Customizable Menu
custom-menu.description: You can customize menu sections/options visibility.

tags-management.title: Tags Management
tags-management.description: You can create tags to group accounts easily and run bulk operations in a more organized way.

account-customization.title: Account Customization
account-customization.description: Sometimes you could need a specific display name for identifying an account. If you want, you can change the current display name with a custom name.
account-customization.note: Note: this only applies visually to the Aerial accounts.
